Potluckness

Online potluck manager

My family throws a lot of big potluck parties, so I built an online potluck manager to help us out. I personally took the application from concept to creation with the help of developer Lenny Turetsky.

Potluckness is built in Ruby on Rails.

http://potluckness.com
